data.quote: The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Sometimes it's the people no one imagines anthing of who do the things that no one can imagine.
data.author: Alan Turing

data.quote: Not everyone who works hard are rewarded, However all those who succeed have worked hard.
data.author: Kamogawa Genji

data.quote: In the new world, it is not the big fish which eats the small fish, it's the fast fish which eats the slow fish.
data.author: Kiaus Schwab
